document.full_text: the international tennis federation (itf) has rejected spain's appeal over the legality of the hard court surface chosen by the united states for july's davis cup world group quarter-final.
document.title: itf rejects spain challenge to u.s. court choice
lines_and_colors: the international tennis federation (itf) has rejected spain's appeal over the legality of the hard court surface chosen by the united states for july's davis cup world group quarter-final.
